ygData.subject: Re: Sitting made productive.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... With my natural drow intelligence being 99, it only takes me about 30 seconds of pressing the sense heading button to max it out for a level. What *I* do
ygData.messageBody:
"Brandon R. Veatch" wrote:
>
> From: "Brandon R. Veatch" <lrddragn@...>
>
> I use my sense direction skill while I heal..hehe

With my natural drow intelligence being 99, it only takes me about 30
seconds of pressing the sense heading button to max it out for a level.
What *I* do when i sit and rest, is read the forgotten realm series of
books. From level 1 to level 20, what my character is now, I've went
through 3 books :) It's cool to read how Verant took the characters from
the books and how their natural races have been complimented by their
corresponding cities.

Nick
